title: I tanuvunu
sahitya:
I tanuvunu benci Emi phalamu bhUtalAniki balu bhUdharamE gAni


anupallavi

  nA manasAra shrI nAthuni kIrtanamE Emraka jEsi Anandamu jendani


caraNam 1    satatamu nI pada sannutulaku bhAgavatulanu jEri sahavAsamu sEyani
    caraNam 2    vInula vindhuga vINA nAdamutO gAnamu jEsi su-jnAnamu jendani
    caraNam 3    gOpAladAsuDu kOri bhajinceDu shrI pAvana nAmamu cintana sEyani
